sections.heading: GENERAL REFUND POLICY
sections.body:
## Refund Policy Summary

- **No Refund Policy**: Cyberize Group maintains a strict no refund policy for all Products and Services offered on this website, unless explicitly stated otherwise in writing.
  
- **Acceptance of Terms**: By using this website, you acknowledge and accept these Terms, thereby forfeiting the right to claim any refunds for fees paid for access to and use of the Products or Services.

For any questions or clarifications, please contact our support team.

sections.heading: WEBSITE CANCELLATION POLICY
sections.body:
# Termination of Services

The Client may terminate any or all outstanding work at their discretion with immediate written notice. 

### Post-Termination Process
- Upon termination notice, Cyberize Group will:
  - Inform the Client of the extent of completed work.
  - Provide access to existing work products and deliverables via a Google Drive folder.
  
- **Download Access**: The Client has **30 days** to download all materials before access is revoked and the folder contents are deleted.

### Fees
- If the Client discontinues services, a fee will apply:
  - **25% administrative/project management fee** or the **current hourly billable rate**, whichever is greater.
  - If no hourly rates are disclosed, the default rate is **$150 per hour**.
  - The 25% fee applies to the entire project budget.

For further assistance, please contact Cyberize Group.

sections.heading: WEBSITE REFUND POLICY
sections.body:
# Project Termination Policy

In the event of project termination by the client:

- **Immediate Action**: Cyberize Group will cease all work upon receipt of termination notice.
- **Fees**:
  - A **25% administrative/project management fee** will be charged, or the **current hourly billable rate**, whichever is greater.
  - If no hourly rates are disclosed, the default rate is **$150 per hour**.
  - The 25% fee applies to the entire project budget.
- **Deliverables**: All claims to work and deliverables will be forfeited upon refund request.
- **Refund Eligibility**: Clients are not eligible for a refund if the project is abandoned for **two (2) or more weeks**.

---

**Last Updated**: February 16, 2018  
**Today's Date**: May 17, 2025

sections.heading: This third party embed for Google Maps is being blocked
sections.body:

## Google Maps Service Consent

We require your permission to load the Google Maps service. This third-party feature will not display until you provide consent. 

### Action Required
- To enable this service, please click **'Accept'**.

### Important Note
This content cannot load due to undisclosed trackers. The website owner must:
1. Add the Google Maps service to the final page of their Cookie Policy and Consent Tool questionnaire in their Termageddon account.
2. Click **'Submit'** after adding the service.

Once these steps are completed, the service will load based on user consent choices.

### More Information
